member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IAuditLogger
member.summary: Interface for Audit logging

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IAuditLogger.GetAuditFlag(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the value for the specified audit flag.
member.returns: flag value (0 = logging off, 1 = logging on

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IAuditLogger.SetAuditFlag(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value for the specified audit flag.
member.param: 0 = turn off logging, 1 = turn on logging

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IAuditLogger.Log(System.String,Microsoft.Uii.Common.Entities.LogData)
member.summary: Logs the messages to the database using the AuditLog web service asynchronously. Caching done based on the NoCache property. Message will be logged only if GetAuditFlag(auditFlagName) returns non-zero. Use SetAuditFlag(auditFlagName) to set.
member.param: Audit log record where ToString() will be used to extract contents

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IAuditLogger.CacheMaxSize
member.summary: Maximum size of the the Audit Log cache. Size change will take effect on next Log() call.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IAuditLogger.NoCache
member.summary: Indicates whether audit messages to be cached or not. If true, no caching happens and all the messages will be logged immediately. If false, messages are cached and flushed to underlaying thing when the cache limit reached or certain events happen such as session close.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger
member.summary: The logging class used by UII that implements a listening system to allow multiple listeners to hook in and log messages.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Error(System.String,System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: This is used to display messages that represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceError. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
The message to place in the log.
The exception used in writing out the error.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Error(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This is used to display messages that represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceError. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Nmae to give for the application
String format for the message to be placed in the log
Parameters to be substituted into the stirng format.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Info(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This is used to display messages that are useful, but do not represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceInfo. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
Parameters to be substituted into the string format.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Trace(System.String)
member.summary: This is used to display messages for debugging but not normal operation. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceVerbose. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: The message to write out to the trace.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Trace(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This is used to display messages for debugging but not normal operation. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceVerbose. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
Parameters to be substituted into the string format.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.TryInitialize
member.summary: Provides for the explicit initialization of logging listeners, rather than defering to first use of the Logging class. Use of this method is not required.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Warn(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: This is used to display messages that may represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceWarning. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application.
The message to place in the log.
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
Logging listeners are not permitted to call methods of the Logging class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Uii.Common.IDiagnosticLogger.Warn(System.String,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: This is used to display messages that may represent a problem. It only displays when the TraceSwitch is assigned TraceWarning. It takes the string passed in and sends it to any trace listener. It also will display it in a list control if one has been made available or in the various logs.
member.param: Name to give for the application
Parameters to be substituted into the string format
member.exception: Configuration-related exceptions are wrapped in this common exception type.
